keyEvents.title: Zoro Unleashes Asura
keyEvents.description: Zoro manifests his Asura technique for the first time within the Tower of Justice during his battle with Kaku.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most iconic power reveals in the series takes place in this location.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Defeats Kaku
keyEvents.description: The battle between Zoro and Kaku concludes with Zoro's victory inside the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: Marks a major victory for the Straw Hats in their mission to rescue Robin.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Activates Gear 2
keyEvents.description: Luffy activates Gear 2 for the first time during his battle with Rob Lucci in the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: Major power reveal for the series protagonist occurs in this location.

keyEvents.title: Rob Lucci's Hybrid Transformation
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci transforms into his leopard-human hybrid form within the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: The escalation of the main battle of the arc takes place here.

keyEvents.title: Robin Resists Spandam
keyEvents.description: Robin desperately resists being dragged across the Bridge of Hesitation toward the Gates of Justice by Spandam.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Robin's will to live and hope for rescue, marking her character growth.

keyEvents.title: Major Battles Reach Climax
keyEvents.description: The battles throughout Enies Lobby reach their climactic moments with Zoro's Asura debut and Luffy's Gear 2 activation.
keyEvents.significance: The island serves as the setting for some of the most important power reveals and battles in the series.
